name: my-sass
description: Project to test some Vercel features + work some ideas

scripts.db:windows:local: docker run --name my-saas -e POSTGRES_USER=postgres -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=123456 -e POSTGRES_DB=my_saas -e PGDATA=/var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata -v %cd%\tmp\db:/var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata -p 5432:5432 -d postgres:14.1-alpine
scripts.db:local: docker run --name my-saas -e POSTGRES_USER=postgres -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=123456 -e POSTGRES_DB=my_saas -e PGDATA=/var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata -v $(pwd)/tmp/db:/var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata -p 5432:5432 -d postgres:14.1-alpine
